Segment.name: PID
Segment.comment: To describe a product or process in coded or free-form format

Field.name: ItemDescriptionType
Field.comment: Code indicating the format of a description

Field.name: ProductProcessCharacteristicCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the general class of a product or process characteristic

Field.name: AgencyQualifierCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the agency assigning the code values

Field.name: ProductDescriptionCode
Field.comment: A code from an industry code list which provides specific data about a product characteristic

Field.name: Description
Field.comment: A free-form description to clarify the related data elements and their content

Field.name: SurfaceLayerPositionCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the product surface, layer or position that is being described

Field.name: SourceSubqualifier
Field.comment: A reference that indicates the table or text maintained by the Source Qualifier

Field.name: YesNoConditionOrResponseCode
Field.comment: Code indicating a Yes or No condition or response

Field.name: LanguageCode
Field.comment: Code designating the language used in text, from a standard code list maintained by the International Standards Organization (ISO 639)

SyntaxNote.name: C0403
SyntaxNote.comment: If PID04 is present, then PID03 is required.

SyntaxNote.name: R0405
SyntaxNote.comment: At least one of PID04 or PID05 is required.

SyntaxNote.name: C0703
SyntaxNote.comment: If PID07 is present, then PID03 is required.

SyntaxNote.name: C0804
SyntaxNote.comment: If PID08 is present, then PID04 is required.

SyntaxNote.name: C0905
SyntaxNote.comment: If PID09 is present, then PID05 is required.
